revision.text:
This page provides pointers to all specifications of SBGN languages, including all past public versions and the last drafts. Note that the [[Documents/Specifications | current public specifications]] should preferably be used.
== Process Description Language ==
* [http://precedings.nature.com/documents/3721/version/4 Process Description language Level 1 Version 1.3] released on 14 February 2011 * [http://precedings.nature.com/documents/3721/version/2 Process Description language Level 1 Version 1.2] released on 3 October 2010 * [http://precedings.nature.com/documents/3721/version/1 Process Description language Level 1 Version 1.1] released on 02 September 2009 * [http://precedings.nature.com/documents/2320/version/1 Process Description language Level 1 Version 1.0] released on 15 August 2008
== Entity Relationship Language==
* [http://svn.code.sf.net/p/sbgn/code/EntityRelationship/tags/Level1-Version2/sbgn_ER-level1.pdf Entity Relationship language Level 1 Version 2] released on 4 September 2015 * [http://precedings.nature.com/documents/5902/version/1 Entity Relationship language Level 1 Version 1.2] released on 14 April 2011 * [http://precedings.nature.com/documents/3719/version/2 Entity Relationship language Level 1 Version 1.1] released on 6 October 2010 * [http://precedings.nature.com/documents/3719/version/1 Entity Relationship language Level 1 Version 1.0] released on 3 September 2009
== Activity Flow Language ==
* [{{activity-flow-L1V1.2}} Activity Flow language Level 1 Version 1.2] released on 4 September 2015 * [http://precedings.nature.com/documents/3724/version/1 Activity Flow language Level 1 Version 1] released on 4 September 2009
